dcterms:description: The IWSLT dataset is used for fine-tuning translation performance between non-English languages, focusing on multilingual translation data.
dcterms:title: IWSLT

dcterms:description: The WMT dataset is utilized for instruction tuning and includes development sets from WMT2017 to WMT2020, covering multiple language directions.

dcterms:description: Flores-200 is used for evaluation on zero-shot translation directions and comprises sentences translated into about 200 languages by professional translators.
dcterms:title: Flores-200
